text: Hi Everryone, it seems when i create a workflow on contacts, updated date has changed  but when i request for contacts with updated time, i don't get the contact, any info about ? Thanks
Any way to get the labels of pipes/stages in place of the numeric id without using an API call?
Sure just use the HubSpot ui
Specifically for use in workflows, I mean. Say for instance I want to use it in a format data or even as input in a custom code box
You could manually create a lookup table using custom code but without the api that's going to be a little difficult
Yeah as it stands right now I'll probably create a static list of the pipelines and stages and use an API call as a fallback in case someone adds or edits the pipelines without updating the workflow
Yeah that's a great way to do it

Those cards are pretty cool, however we want to be able to execute these actions in bulk (by selecting arbitrary number of contacts in contact list) â€¦  seems these cards would necessitate drilling down into each contact individually.

Hello everyone. Does anyone know, in the UI, how to show a dynamic landing page as a Thank you. Use Case: Show a different calendar on the thanks page depending on the question answered on form on the landing page. I cannot make it work. User: fill out form, choose option A from a drop down, Thanks page Shows calendar for A. User chooses option B, they see the calendar for B. Help :slightly_smiling_face: If not in UI, can you give me some hints on where to put the code?
